title: Bug 138175: Bookmark link set in drill through link should be saved in Hyperlink Options dialog.
OB: When reopening the Hyperlink Options dialog, the selected bookmark is not displayed, even though it is saved in the xml source. The expected result is that the target bookmark should be displayed in the Hyperlink Options dialog.
EB: Define a drill through link with a target bookmark selected.
SR: Verify that when the Hyperlink Options dialog is reopened, the selected bookmark is displayed.
